question: Which mobile network offers broadband facility with top download speed of 100 megabit per second on its fibre-to-the-home network?
explanation: Bharat Sanhcar Nigam Ltd at present offers broadband facility with top download speed of 100 megabit per second on its fibre-to-the-home network.
